name: KUHLFan
0:
”Alexa, turn on the fan”
”Alexa, turn off the fan”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your KUHL Fan products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1.Download our “KUHL Fan” app in app market then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account).
2.Configure our device in “KUHL Fan” app and change appropriate name for your devices.
3.Link Alexa Skill from our “KUHL Fan” app. After Login, go to Profile Page and then go to Setup Alexa, follow the instruction on the page to complete linking.
4.Tell Echo “Alexa, discover my devices”. Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”.
Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home device like these:
Alexa, turn on the fan.
Alexa, turn off the fan.
